snippet: Coaxing a multimillion-dollar collector car along the 1,500-mile route of the Pebble Beach Motoring Classic invariably requires improvisation.
abstract: Coaxing a multimillion-dollar collector car along the 1,500-mile route of the Pebble Beach Motoring Classic invariably requires improvisation.

headline.main: Ballpoint-Pen Springs and Other Fixes for Vintage Bugattis
